app.title: Computing Program for Rorschach Structural Summary
app.provider: Provided by Seoul Institute of Clinical Psychology

nav.aiGuide: After Google login and API key registration, you can chat with an AI that helps interpret test results.

welcome.title: Computing Program for Rorschach Structural Summary
welcome.continueMsg: There is content you worked on last time.

reset.title: Please confirm again
reset.message: Do you want to reset all current inputs?

ai.title: Preparation Step: Please download the CSV file by clicking the green buttons on the previous screen.
ai.message: The AI chatbot currently connected is Gemini Gems, which requires a Google account.

ad.title: Please wait a moment
ad.message: Log in to view results without ads.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.noticeText_part1: This app temporarily stores data entered in the 'Scoring & Structural Summary' tab in your computer's browser's local storage (LocalStorage) for your scoring convenience.
privacy.noticeText_part2: This data is not transmitted to the server or accessible by the operator, and is used solely for the purpose of restoring input content when you revisit the browser.
privacy.noticeText_part3: When using AI features after login, saved API keys are managed in encrypted form, and reference context (built-in docs and user-added knowledge sources) may be sent with chat requests to improve response quality.

input.guideResponse: Used to memo the subject's verbal responses; it is not used in calculations, so it may be left blank.
input.tooltipInfo:
Only the bottommost row can be manipulated,
and up to 50 rows are possible.
input.rowOrderTip:
The order of response rows does not affect the calculation results.
For example, it's fine to record content for Card 6 in the 8th row and content for Card 2 in the 14th row.
input.pairDisabledTooltip: Reflection (Fr/rF) already implies symmetry. Pair (2) cannot be recorded concurrently.

indices.title: Special Indices
indices.sconNote: ( Note: Applies only to examinees aged 14 or older )
indices.sconMain: Check if 8 or more criteria are met
indices.depiMain: Check if 5 or more criteria are met
indices.cdiMain: Check if 4 or more criteria are met
indices.hviMain: Check if criterion (1) is met and 4 or more of criteria (2)~(8) are met
indices.obsMain: Check if 1 or more of the conditions below are met

overScoring.title: Over-scoring Warning
overScoring.message:
Having 4 or more determinants is rare.
1. Did the examinee actually say this?
2. Did you accidentally score Form (F) multiple times?

categoryDup.title: Category Duplication Check
categoryDup.message: This is not about the number of objects. Enter the same category (e.g., Animal A) only once.

hierarchy.title: Hierarchy Check
hierarchy.message: Too many scores. Be careful not to enter cognitive scores multiple times for the same expression. (Higher scores include lower scores.)

tooManyResponses.title: Too Many Responses Warning (R ≥ 45)
tooManyResponses.message: The number of responses is too high. Please review the test administration process.

validity.title: Validity Warning
validity.message: If the number of responses is less than 14, the profile validity may be low, reducing the reliability of interpretation.

resetComplete.title: Reset Complete
resetComplete.message: All input values have been reset.

autoSaved.title: Auto Saved
autoSaved.message: Your input has been automatically saved.

reflectionPair.title: Reflection-Pair Exclusion
reflectionPair.message: Reflection (Fr/rF) is scored, so Pair (2) has been automatically cleared.

dqVagueFq.title: DQ-FQ Constraint
dqVagueFq.message: When DQ is 'v' (vague), FQ '+' (superior) cannot be selected and has been reset.

dqVagueZ.title: DQ-Z Constraint
dqVagueZ.message: When DQ is 'v' (vague), organizational activity (Z) is not applicable.

pureDeterminantFq.title: Pure Determinant FQ
pureDeterminantFq.message: Only formless determinants are scored, so FQ has been automatically set to 'none'.

specialScoreLevel.title: Special Score Level Conflict
specialScoreLevel.message: Level 1 and Level 2 of the same special score cannot coexist. The previous level has been removed.

apiKeyError.title: Error
apiKeyError.message: Failed to save API key. Please try again.

aiInterpretLogin.title: Login required
aiInterpretLogin.message: Please sign in with Google to use AI interpretation.

aiInterpretApiKey.title: API key setup required
aiInterpretApiKey.message: Please register your API key in Account Settings. Then AI interpretation will be ready.

loader.subtext: Calculation results are auto-saved in the browser and can be loaded later.

export.rawDataTitle: Export all items entered by the user in CSV format
export.summaryTitle: Export all items calculated in the structural summary in CSV format

footer.title: Computing Program for Rorschach Structural Summary
footer.copyright: © 1997–2026 서울임상심리연구소 (Seoul Institute of Clinical Psychology, SICP). All rights reserved.

codeList.header: Code list and descriptions for each scoring item.

specialIndices.scon_main: Check if 8 or more criteria are met
specialIndices.scon_note: ( Note: Applies only to examinees aged 14 or older )
specialIndices.depi_main: Check if 5 or more criteria are met
specialIndices.cdi_main: Check if 4 or more criteria are met
specialIndices.hvi_main: Check if criterion (1) is met and 4 or more of criteria (2)~(8) are met
specialIndices.obs_main: Check if 1 or more of the conditions below are met

account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your account settings and API keys.

knowledgeSources.title: Knowledge Sources
knowledgeSources.description: Add your own notes/files. AI chat will prioritize these sources over built-in docs when relevant.

chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I couldn't get a response. Please check your API key and try again.
chat.emptyStateDescription: Choose a conversation from the sidebar, or type a message below to start a new one.
chat.readingResults: Reading the assessment results. Please wait a moment...
chat.resultsReady: I have finished reading all results. Please ask any questions you have.
chat.apiKeyMissing: No API key is registered yet. Please add it in Account Settings.
chat.billingOrQuota: Please check your API billing or quota status. After updating it, try again and I will continue helping.
chat.invalidApiKey: Please check the API key you entered. It may be invalid or expired.

store.title: Skill Book Store
store.subtitle: Explore and apply interpretation Skill Books created by other professionals.
store.comingSoonDesc: A marketplace where you can purchase Rorschach interpretation Skill Books with credits and sell your own is opening soon.
store.author: Author
store.importedMessage: Skill Book was copied to your account.
store.alreadyImported: This Skill Book is already in your account.
store.importFailed: Could not copy this Skill Book. Please try again.
store.loadFailed: Could not load Skill Book Store. Please try again.

builder.title: Skill Book Builder
builder.subtitle: Create your own interpretation Skill Book.
builder.comingSoonDesc: Upload your textbooks, notes, and clinical experience, and AI will convert them into your own Rorschach interpretation Skill Book.
builder.noSources: Add at least one source before generating.
builder.generateFailed: Could not generate draft. Check API key/provider and try again.
builder.generatedMessage: Instructions and documents were filled automatically.
builder.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Max size is 500KB.

myBooks.title: My Skill Books
myBooks.subtitle: Manage Skill Books you created or purchased.
myBooks.comingSoonDesc: Create, manage, and export (.md) your Skill Books. This feature is coming soon.
myBooks.name: Name
myBooks.instructionsPlaceholder: Write the system prompt that will guide AI behavior...
myBooks.defaultDescription: Built-in interpretation guidelines by Seoul Institute of Clinical Psychology
myBooks.documentsInvalid: Documents must be a JSON array of {title, content} with non-empty strings.
myBooks.deleteConfirm: Delete this Skill Book? This action cannot be undone.
myBooks.loadFailed: Failed to load Skill Books. Please try again.
myBooks.saveFailed: Failed to save Skill Book. Please try again.
myBooks.deleteFailed: Failed to delete Skill Book. Please try again.
myBooks.activateFailed: Failed to switch active Skill Book. Please try again.
